The Oculus OpenXR Mobile SDK is not included as part of O3DE.

When enabling OpenXRVk Gem, download the SDK and uncompress it in the following folder within the gem:
OpenXRVk\External\OculusOpenXRMobileSDK

The Oculus OpenXR Mobile SDK can be found in the following link:
https://developer.oculus.com/downloads/native-android/
